site_name: Part of Phases 2A and 2B, Redevelopment site at Wornington Green Estate, Wornington Road, LONDON
description: Verification Order required to amend Joint Decision and Verification Order SNN/22/02110, issued 15/06/22, as follows:The residential address - 3 Murchison Gardens W10 5PX- to be added. (See Numbering Schedule A attached)The Address - 109 Wornington Road W10 5YB - to be deleted.The residential units at 1 Wheatstone Gardens W10 5AF - to be amended to 25 Units. (See Numbering Schedule B attached)The Address - 3 Wheatstone Gardens W10 5AF- to be deleted.The residential units at 27 Wheatstone Gardens W10 5AF- to be amended to 41 Units. (See Numbering Schedule C attached)
